contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox German district| name=Regen| state=Bavaria| capital=[[Regen]]| regierungsbezirk=[[Niederbayern]]| region=Donau-Wald| area=975|Kreisschlüssel = 09276 | population=82,500| population_as_of=2000| density=85| carsign=REG| url=[http://www.landkreis-regen.de landkreis-regen.de]| map=Bavaria reg.png }} '''Regen''' is a district in [[Bavaria]], [[Germany]]. It is bounded by (from the south and clockwise) the districts of [[Freyung-Grafenau]], [[Deggendorf (district)|Deggendorf]], [[Straubing-Bogen]] and [[Cham (district)|Cham]], and by the [[Czech Republic]] ([[Plzeň Region]]). ==History== The district was established in 1972 by merging the former districts of Regen and Viechtach. ==Geography== The district is entirely located in the [[Bavarian Forest]]. It is named after the [[Regen river]] and its two headstreams, the Black Regen and the White Regen. ==Coat of arms== {| |- valign=top ||[[File:Wappen Landkreis Regen.png|Coat of arms]] ||The coat of arms displays: * the blue and white checked pattern of Bavaria * a glass, symbolising the glass industry * a pine tree, symbolising the [[Bavarian Forest]] * a tower, symbolising the castles in the district |} ==Towns and municipalities== {| ! align=left width=33%|Towns ! align=left width=33%|Municipalities ! align=left width=33%| |- valign=top || #[[Regen]] #[[Viechtach]] #[[Zwiesel]] || #[[Achslach]] #[[Arnbruck]] #[[Bayerisch Eisenstein]] #[[Bischofsmais]] #[[Böbrach]] #[[Bodenmais]] #[[Drachselsried]] #[[Frauenau]] #[[Geiersthal]] #[[Gotteszell]] || <ol start=11> <li>[[Kirchberg im Wald]] <li>[[Kirchdorf im Wald]] <li>[[Kollnburg]] <li>[[Langdorf]] <li>[[Lindberg]] <li>[[Patersdorf]] <li>[[Prackenbach]] <li>[[Rinchnach]] <li>[[Ruhmannsfelden]] <li>[[Teisnach]] <li>[[Zachenberg]] </ol> |} ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== {{commons category|Landkreis Regen}} *[http://www.landkreis-regen.de/ Official website] (German) {{Germany_districts_bavaria}} {{Coord|49.0|13.17|display=title|format=dms}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Regen (District)}} [[Category:Districts of Bavaria]] [[Category:Regen (district)| ]]
